EmailTemplate.subject: CX Minute: Cut through the email clutter.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Learn how to reduce customer effort.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywell]]> <[[https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475]]> <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]>
Give us 60-seconds <[[https://corpapp.honeywell.com/sites/honvideo/Pages/Player.aspx?bctid=4874417282001&UsrId=e045068&ItmId=5969]]> to help you cut through the email clutter. And make every message you write easy to read and understand.
Most of us spend a significant portion of our day composing email messages. But the messages we send can be confusing for our customers. Reducing customer effort – before you hit “send” – is clarity in communication. Writing more clearly is a powerful way to ensure that our customers spend less time and effort trying to understand our email messages. Remember:
If you confuse them, you lose them.
Want to get started? Watch the next CX Minute writing video <[[https://corpapp.honeywell.com/sites/honvideo/Pages/Player.aspx?bctid=4874417282001&UsrId=e045068&ItmId=5969]]> now! Then, let us know what you think. And how we can help you.
